Issue Management Commands.name: AddCommentToIssue
Issue Management Commands.description: Adds a new comment to the specified issue.

Issue Management Commands.name: AttachElementsToIssue
Issue Management Commands.description: Attaches elements to the specified issue.

Issue Management Commands.name: DetachElementsFromIssue
Issue Management Commands.description: Detaches elements from the specified issue.

Issue Management Commands.name: ExportIssuesToBCF
Issue Management Commands.description: Exports specified issues to a BCF file.

Issue Management Commands.name: GetCommentsFromIssue
Issue Management Commands.description: Retrieves comments information from the specified issue.

Issue Management Commands.name: GetElementsAttachedToIssue
Issue Management Commands.description: Retrieves attached elements of the specified issue, filtered by attachment type.

Issue Management Commands.name: ImportIssuesFromBCF
Issue Management Commands.description: Imports issues from the specified BCF file.

Library Commands.name: AddFilesToEmbeddedLibrary
Library Commands.description: Adds the given files into the embedded library.

Library Commands.name: GetLibraries
Library Commands.description: Gets the list of loaded libraries.

Favorites Commands.name: ApplyFavoritesToElementDefaults
Favorites Commands.description: Apply the given favorites to element defaults.

Favorites Commands.name: CreateFavoritesFromElements
Favorites Commands.description: Create favorites from the given elements.

Favorites Commands.name: GetFavoritesByType
Favorites Commands.description: Returns a list of the names of all favorites with the given element type

Element Commands.name: ChangeSelectionOfElements
Element Commands.description: Adds/removes a number of elements to/from the current selection.

Element Commands.name: CreateColumns
Element Commands.description: Creates Column elements based on the given parameters.

Element Commands.name: CreateMeshes
Element Commands.description: Creates Mesh elements based on the given parameters.

Element Commands.name: CreateObjects
Element Commands.description: Creates Object elements based on the given parameters.

Element Commands.name: CreatePolylines
Element Commands.description: Creates Polyline elements based on the given parameters.

Element Commands.name: CreateSlabs
Element Commands.description: Creates Slab elements based on the given parameters.

Element Commands.name: CreateZones
Element Commands.description: Creates Zone elements based on the given parameters.

Element Commands.name: DeleteElements
Element Commands.description: Deletes elements.

Element Commands.name: FilterElements
Element Commands.description: Tests an elements by the given criterias.

Element Commands.name: Get3DBoundingBoxes
Element Commands.description: Get the 3D bounding box of elements. The bounding box is calculated from the global origin in the 3D view. The output is the array of the bounding boxes respective to the input array of elements.

Element Commands.name: GetAllElements
Element Commands.description: Returns the identifier of all elements on the plan. Use the optional filter parameter for filtering.

Element Commands.name: GetClassificationsOfElements
Element Commands.description: Returns the classification of the given elements in the given classification systems. It works for subelements of hierarchal elements also.

Element Commands.name: GetCollisions
Element Commands.description: Detect collisions between the given two groups of elements.

Element Commands.name: GetConnectedElements
Element Commands.description: Gets connected elements of the given elements.

Element Commands.name: GetDetailsOfElements
Element Commands.description: Gets the details of the given elements (geometry parameters etc).

Element Commands.name: GetElementsByType
Element Commands.description: Returns the identifier of every element of the given type on the plan. It works for any type. Use the optional filter parameter for filtering.

Element Commands.name: GetGDLParametersOfElements
Element Commands.description: Gets all the GDL parameters (name, type, value) of the given elements.

Element Commands.name: GetSelectedElements
Element Commands.description: Gets the list of the currently selected elements.

Element Commands.name: GetSubelementsOfHierarchicalElements
Element Commands.description: Gets the subelements of the given hierarchical elements.

Element Commands.name: GetZoneBoundaries
Element Commands.description: Gets the boundaries of the given Zone (connected elements, neighbour zones, etc.).

Element Commands.name: HighlightElements
Element Commands.description: Highlights the elements given in the elements array. In case of empty elements array removes all previously set highlights.

Element Commands.name: MoveElements
Element Commands.description: Moves elements with a given vector.

Element Commands.name: SetClassificationsOfElements
Element Commands.description: Sets the classifications of elements. In order to set the classification of an element to unclassified, omit the classificationItemId field. It works for subelements of hierarchal elements also.

Element Commands.name: SetDetailsOfElements
Element Commands.description: Sets the details of the given elements (floor, layer, order etc).

Element Commands.name: SetGDLParametersOfElements
Element Commands.description: Sets the given GDL parameters of the given elements.

Attribute Commands.name: CreateBuildingMaterials
Attribute Commands.description: Creates Building Material attributes based on the given parameters.

Attribute Commands.name: CreateComposites
Attribute Commands.description: Creates Composite attributes based on the given parameters.

Attribute Commands.name: CreateLayers
Attribute Commands.description: Creates Layer attributes based on the given parameters.

Attribute Commands.name: CreateSurfaces
Attribute Commands.description: Creates Surface attributes based on the given parameters.

Attribute Commands.name: GetAttributesByType
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the details of every attribute of the given type.

Attribute Commands.name: GetBuildingMaterialPhysicalProperties
Attribute Commands.description: Retrieves the physical properties of the given Building Materials.

Property Commands.name: CreatePropertyDefinitions
Property Commands.description: Creates Custom Property Definitions based on the given parameters.

Property Commands.name: CreatePropertyGroups
Property Commands.description: Creates Property Groups based on the given parameters.

Property Commands.name: DeletePropertyDefinitions
Property Commands.description: Deletes the given Custom Property Definitions.

Property Commands.name: DeletePropertyGroups
Property Commands.description: Deletes the given Custom Property Groups.

Property Commands.name: GetAllProperties
Property Commands.description: Returns all user defined and built-in properties.

Property Commands.name: GetPropertyValuesOfAttributes
Property Commands.description: Returns the property values of the attributes for the given property.

Property Commands.name: GetPropertyValuesOfElements
Property Commands.description: Returns the property values of the elements for the given property. It works for subelements of hierarchal elements also.

Property Commands.name: SetPropertyValuesOfAttributes
Property Commands.description: Sets the property values of attributes.

Property Commands.name: SetPropertyValuesOfElements
Property Commands.description: Sets the property values of elements. It works for subelements of hierarchal elements also.

Application Commands.name: GetAddOnVersion
Application Commands.description: Retrieves the version of the Tapir Additional JSON Commands Add-On.

Application Commands.name: GetArchicadLocation
Application Commands.description: Retrieves the location of the currently running Archicad executable.

Application Commands.name: GetCurrentWindowType
Application Commands.description: Returns the type of the current (active) window.

Application Commands.name: QuitArchicad
Application Commands.description: Performs a quit operation on the currently running Archicad instance.

Revision Management Commands.name: GetCurrentRevisionChangesOfLayouts
Revision Management Commands.description: Retrieves all changes belong to the last revision of the given layouts.

Revision Management Commands.name: GetRevisionChangesOfElements
Revision Management Commands.description: Retrieves the changes belong to the given elements.

Navigator Commands.name: GetDatabaseIdFromNavigatorItemId
Navigator Commands.description: Gets the ID of the database associated with the supplied navigator item id

Navigator Commands.name: GetView2DTransformations
Navigator Commands.description: Get zoom and rotation of 2D views

Navigator Commands.name: GetViewSettings
Navigator Commands.description: Gets the view settings of navigator items

Navigator Commands.name: PublishPublisherSet
Navigator Commands.description: Performs a publish operation on the currently opened project. Only the given publisher set will be published.

Navigator Commands.name: SetViewSettings
Navigator Commands.description: Sets the view settings of navigator items

Navigator Commands.name: UpdateDrawings
Navigator Commands.description: Performs a drawing update on the given elements.

Project Commands.name: GetHotlinks
Project Commands.description: Gets the file system locations (path) of the hotlink modules. The hotlinks can have tree hierarchy in the project.

Project Commands.name: GetProjectInfo
Project Commands.description: Retrieves information about the currently loaded project.

Project Commands.name: GetProjectInfoFields
Project Commands.description: Retrieves the names and values of all project info fields.

Project Commands.name: GetStories
Project Commands.description: Retrieves information about the story sructure of the currently loaded project.

Project Commands.name: SetProjectInfoField
Project Commands.description: Sets the value of a project info field.

Project Commands.name: SetStories
Project Commands.description: Sets the story sructure of the currently loaded project.

Teamwork Commands.name: TeamworkReceive
Teamwork Commands.description: Performs a receive operation on the currently opened Teamwork project.

Teamwork Commands.name: TeamworkSend
Teamwork Commands.description: Performs a send operation on the currently opened Teamwork project.

View Map Commands.name: API.CloneProjectMapItemToViewMap
View Map Commands.description: Clones a project map item to the view map.

View Map Commands.name: API.CreateViewMapFolder
View Map Commands.description: Creates a view folder item at the given position in the navigator tree.

Attribute Commands.name: API.CreateAttributeFolders
Attribute Commands.description: Creates attribute folders. To create a folder, its full path has to be provided. The command will create all folders along the path, if they do not exist.

Attribute Commands.name: API.DeleteAttributeFolders
Attribute Commands.description: Deletes attribute folders and all the deletable attributes and folders it contains. To delete a folder, its identifier has to be provided.

Attribute Commands.name: API.DeleteAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Deletes attributes.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetActivePenTables
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the model view and layout book pen table identifiers.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetAttributeFolderStructure
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed folder structure for the attributes of a given type. If the path is not given, the root folder will be returned

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetAttributeFolders
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed attribute folders identified by their Ids.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetAttributesByType
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the identifier of every attribute of the given type.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetAttributesIndices
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the requested indices and guids of attributes.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetBuildingMaterialAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed building material attributes identified by their GUIDs.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetCompositeAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed composite attributes identified by their GUIDs.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetFillAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed fill attributes identified by their GUIDs.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetLayerAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed layer attributes identified by their GUIDs.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetLayerCombinationAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed layer combination attributes identified by their GUIDs.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetLineAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed line attributes identified by their GUIDs.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetPenTableAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed pen table attributes (including their pens) identified by their GUIDs.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetProfileAttributePreview
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the preview image of each requested profile attribute in a base64 string format.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetProfileAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed profile attributes identified by their GUIDs.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetSurfaceAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed surface attributes identified by their GUIDs.

Attribute Commands.name: API.GetZoneCategoryAttributes
Attribute Commands.description: Returns the detailed zone category attributes identified by their GUIDs.

Attribute Commands.name: API.MoveAttributesAndFolders
Attribute Commands.description: Moves attributes and attribute folders.

Attribute Commands.name: API.RenameAttributeFolders
Attribute Commands.description: Rename attribute folder.

Layout Book Commands.name: API.GetLayoutSettings
Layout Book Commands.description: Returns the parameters (settings) of the given layout.

Layout Book Commands.name: API.SetLayoutSettings
Layout Book Commands.description: Sets the parameters (settings) of the given layout.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetBuiltInContainerNavigatorItems
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns the details of the built-in container navigator items identified by their Ids.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetDetailNavigatorItems
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns the details of the detail navigator items identified by their Ids.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetDocument3DNavigatorItems
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns the details of the 3D document navigator items identified by their Ids.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetElevationNavigatorItems
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns the detailed elevation navigator items identified by their Ids.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetInteriorElevationNavigatorItems
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns the details of the interior elevation navigator items identified by their Ids.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetNavigatorItemTree
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns the tree of navigator items.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetNavigatorItemsType
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns all navigator item types based on the navigator item identifiers given. An error is returned for each identifier that is not found.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetPublisherSetNames
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns the names of available publisher sets.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetSectionNavigatorItems
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns the details of the section navigator items identified by their Ids.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetStoryNavigatorItems
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns the details of the story navigator items identified by their Ids.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.GetWorksheetNavigatorItems
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Returns the details of the worksheet navigator items identified by their Ids.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.MoveNavigatorItem
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Moves the given navigator item under the parentNavigatorItemId in the navigator tree. If previousNavigatorItemId is not given then inserts it at the first place under the new parent. If it is given then inserts it after this navigator item.

Navigator Tree Commands.name: API.RenameNavigatorItem
Navigator Tree Commands.description: Renames an existing navigator item by specifying either the name or the ID, or both.

AddOn Commands.name: API.ExecuteAddOnCommand
AddOn Commands.description: Executes a command registered in an Add-On.

AddOn Commands.name: API.IsAddOnCommandAvailable
AddOn Commands.description: Checks if the command is available or not.

Element Geometry Commands.name: API.Get2DBoundingBoxes
Element Geometry Commands.description: Get the 2D bounding box of elements identified by their GUIDs. The bounding box is calculated from the global origin on the floor plan view. The output is the array of the bounding boxes respective to the input GUIDs. Only works for elements detailed in Element Information.

Element Geometry Commands.name: API.Get3DBoundingBoxes
Element Geometry Commands.description: Get the 3D bounding box of elements identified by their GUIDs. The bounding box is calculated from the global origin in the 3D view. The output is the array of the bounding boxes respective to the input GUIDs. Only works for elements detailed in Element Information.

Classification Commands.name: API.GetAllClassificationSystems
Classification Commands.description: Returns the list of available classification systems.

Classification Commands.name: API.GetAllClassificationsInSystem
Classification Commands.description: Returns the tree of classifications in the given classification system.

Classification Commands.name: API.GetClassificationItemAvailability
Classification Commands.description: Returns the ids of property definitions available for a given classification item.

Classification Commands.name: API.GetClassificationSystemIds
Classification Commands.description: Returns the list of available classification systems.

Classification Commands.name: API.GetClassificationSystems
Classification Commands.description: Returns the details of classification systems identified by their GUIDs.

Classification Commands.name: API.GetClassificationsOfElements
Classification Commands.description: Returns the classification of the given elements in the given classification systems.

Classification Commands.name: API.GetDetailsOfClassificationItems
Classification Commands.description: Returns the details of classification items.

Classification Commands.name: API.SetClassificationsOfElements
Classification Commands.description: Sets the classifications of elements. In order to set the classification of an element to unclassified, omit the classificationItemId field.

Element Listing Commands.name: API.GetAllElements
Element Listing Commands.description: Returns the identifier of every element in the current plan.

Element Listing Commands.name: API.GetElementsByClassification
Element Listing Commands.description: Returns the identifier of every element with the given classification identifier.

Element Listing Commands.name: API.GetElementsByType
Element Listing Commands.description: Returns the identifier of every element of the given type on the plan.

Element Listing Commands.name: API.GetSelectedElements
Element Listing Commands.description: Returns the identifiers of selected elements in the current plan.

Element Listing Commands.name: API.GetTypesOfElements
Element Listing Commands.description: Returns the types of the given elements.

Property Commands.name: API.GetAllPropertyGroupIds
Property Commands.description: Returns the identifier of every property group in the current plan. The optional propertyType parameter can be used to filter the results based on the type of the property group (Built-in or User Defined).

Property Commands.name: API.GetAllPropertyIds
Property Commands.description: Returns the identifier of every property in the current plan. The optional propertyType parameter can be used to filter the results based on the type of the property (Built-in or User Defined).

Property Commands.name: API.GetAllPropertyIdsOfElements
Property Commands.description: Returns all property identifiers of the given elements. The optional propertyType parameter can be used to filter the results based on the type of the property (Built-in or User Defined).

Property Commands.name: API.GetAllPropertyNames
Property Commands.description: Returns the human-readable names of available Property definitions for debug and development purposes.

Property Commands.name: API.GetDetailsOfProperties
Property Commands.description: Returns the details of property definitions.

Property Commands.name: API.GetPropertyDefinitionAvailability
Property Commands.description: Returns the ids of classification items a given property definition is available for.

Property Commands.name: API.GetPropertyGroups
Property Commands.description: Returns the details of property groups.

Property Commands.name: API.GetPropertyIds
Property Commands.description: Returns the identifiers of property definitions for the requested property names.

Property Commands.name: API.GetPropertyValuesOfElements
Property Commands.description: Returns the property values of the elements for the given property.

Property Commands.name: API.SetPropertyValuesOfElements
Property Commands.description: Sets the property values of elements.

Component Commands.name: API.GetComponentsOfElements
Component Commands.description: Returns the identifier of every component for a list of elements. The order of the returned list is the same as the given elements.

Component Commands.name: API.GetPropertyValuesOfElementComponents
Component Commands.description: Returns the property values of the components for the given property.

Element Relation Commands.name: API.GetElementsRelatedToZones
Element Relation Commands.description: Returns related elements of the given zones. The related elements will be grouped by type. If multiple zones was given, then the order of the returned list is that of the given zones.

Basic Commands.name: API.GetProductInfo
Basic Commands.description: Accesses the version information from the running Archicad.

Basic Commands.name: API.IsAlive
Basic Commands.description: Checks if the Archicad connection is alive.
